channel.title: Request: Blast Pit Tentacle Attack Scene Original VO
channel.description: Hey! I have a simple question: does anybody have access to the original voiceover lines for the Tentacle Attack Scene shown in the 2008 trailer? [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lul60ixy_40[/url] at 1:05 for reference. I haven't done too much digging in the sound files for them, but I've fished up other cut dialog in the past. I would really like to use the original scientist lines, but I'm not sure if they were completely removed or if they're still buried in the files. Any information would help. Thanks in advance. -Lockjaw

item.title: Request: Blast Pit Tentacle Attack Scene Original VO
item.dc:creator: BuzzKillington
item.description:
LOCKJAWVENOM:

A ha! Forgot about that! But, psst… holds up hands Now uh, don’t get me wrong, leaks are horrible and unfortunate! Bad, bad Valvetime! Their review was bull! And screw that German guy who messed up HL2! But, uh… whispers Thank you.

Oh, yes that particular one is a worthy candidate. But I was talking about a different leak… fora remake of another game that I will not mention here.

Read full topic
item.source: Request: Blast Pit Tentacle Attack Scene Original VO

item.title: Request: Blast Pit Tentacle Attack Scene Original VO

item.description:
Hey! I have a simple question: does anybody have access to the original voiceover lines for the Tentacle Attack Scene shown in the 2008 trailer? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lul60ixy_40 at 1:05 for reference. I haven’t done too much digging in the sound files for them, but I’ve fished up other cut dialog in the past. I would really like to use the original scientist lines, but I’m not sure if they were completely removed or if they’re still buried in the files. Any information would help. Thanks in advance. -Lockjaw
